name: Potion Seller (ORNG Studio, ak00mah, velvence, ChimpChimp)
name_original: Potion Seller (ORNG Studio, ak00mah, velvence, ChimpChimp)
description: Drag the ingredients into the cauldron. Once you are happy with your potion, drag it from the cauldron onto the customer. Be careful, the more ingredients you add, the higher the chance it will add a negative effect instead of a positive.
